titleStmt.title: Bhāṭṭadīpikā of Khaṇḍadeva, IV to VIII,iv

repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: Manuscript is flipped. ( Image 123 4th chapter 1st pāda end. (150r)) Guard folio with a user note mentioning - Bhāṭṭadīpikā (4th Adhyāya to the 4th pāda of 8th Adhyāya) Mīmāṃsā Khaṇḍadeva Grantha 252 pages 8 lines. 3 folio with something scribbled on in the Granth script not related to the text. Some folio have design of flower in the left margin on the recto. First 136 folio are missing.

msItem.title: Bhāṭṭadīpikā
msItem.author: Khaṇḍadeva
msItem.incipit: 137v 1 anuṣṭhāpakaḥ pravartanārūpatvāt pravartanārūpo hi vidhīn iṣṭasādhanatvamiva kṛtisādhyatvāparyāyaṃ prayojyatvamapi viṣayasyākṣipatīti bhavati prayojakaḥ tathāpi sa cadu 137v 2 ddeśena prayojayati tasyāpi prayojakatvavyavahāraśāstre atra ca yadyapi na prayojyatvāvacchedena nirupaṇaṃ pratiśeṣatva nirūpaṇasya hetutvaṃ nimittādyaṃgatvābhāvepi
msItem.explicit: 263v 3 siddhyarthatvena sārthakyāt yaditvatideśapakṣepi aupadeśikamantrāmnānādeva yājñārāhityātvaṣatkāraprāptyabhāvena pariśeṣasiddhasvāhākāreṇa prāptirūdbhāvye 263v 4 ta tato nedaṃ liṅgamiti dhyeyam atassiddhaṃ darvihomā apūrvā iti ..
msItem.finalRubric:
263v 4 iti śrīkhaṇḍadevaviracitāyāṃ bhāṭṭadīpikāyāṃ aṣṭamasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ .. adhyāyaśca samāptaḥ 263v 5 … hariḥ oṃ .. śrīśivāyaparamagurave namaḥ … gurave sarvalokānāṃ bhiṣaje bhavarogīṇām niyame sarvavidyānāndakṣiṇāmurtaye namaḥ .. śrīgurūbhyo namaḥ oM
263v 6 kāmakrodhāyānijaśāyakalpoguṇaśālīne kṛṣṇānandasya tasmaikaravai gurave namaḥ asmākaṃ yat kṛpādṛṣṭirthaṃ (1 illegible syllable) kārtthamuktayaḥ kalaye hṛdināṃ bālakeṣu nandasarasvatim .. oṃ tat sat

support.p: Thin palm leaf as guard cover.

extent.measure: 4 blank folio and 2 guard folio, 126 written folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin.

handNote.desc: Handwriting readable, sharp and small characters.

listBibl.bibl: Śrīkhaṇḍadevaviracitā Bhāṭṭadīpikā pradhāna saṃpādaka Dr Manṇḍana miśraḥ saṃpādaka śrīsaṃpannārāyaṇācāryaḥ Rāṣṭrīya Samskṛta Saṃsthāna New Delhi - 2010 Vol 2-3 (dvitīyasaṃpuṭaṃ, tṛtīyasaṃpuṭaṃ)

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.
